resources.string:
1) Please pay attention to the maximum allowed time
2) Please specify a parking time ending notice
3) If you wish, set your usage time manually
4) After the timer set, press the start button
5) For return press back button
Display all possible on-street and off-street parking bays within a certain radius from your intended destination in Melbourne CBD region.
We utilise Google platform to augment your driving experience by providing turn-by-turn navigation.
Actively look for parking bays that suit your demand for duration of stay by filtering out all other irrelevant parking signs.
Avoid violation of time limit by setting a timer to move your vehicle from the parking side.
Get up-to-date information of vacancy in real-time to support your seek for a parking space.
Seek parking is a parking solution which gives you the ability to Search, Navigate and Set Reminder, all with a single touch of the button. It is made to ease your parking experience.\n
The services provided by this app use certain third party data, including such that are licensed by The City of Melbourne.\n

- any inaccuracies or changes to the Seek Parking Services including the location, availability, or terms and conditions that apply to any parking service.
- any interruptions or delays to access the app caused by any act or default of the third party.
- any direct, indirect, or sequential damage incurred by you or the third party in relation to the Seek Parking services.
Find your parking space fastest way
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
